tasks.label: REMOVER Todos os Meta Files
args: Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}/src' -Recurse -Filter 'init.meta.json' | ForEach-Object { Write-Host "Removendo: $($_.FullName)"; Remove-Item $_.FullName -Force }; Write-Host "Todos removidos!" -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: CRIAR Meta Apenas em Pastas Sem Init
args: $folders = Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}/src' -Directory -Recurse; $created = 0; foreach($f in $folders) { $hasInit = (Test-Path "$($f.FullName)/init.luau") -or (Test-Path "$($f.FullName)/init.client.luau") -or (Test-Path "$($f.FullName)/init.server.luau"); if(-not $hasInit) { '{"ignoreUnknownInstances": true}' | Out-File "$($f.FullName)/init.meta.json" -Encoding UTF8; Write-Host "Criado: $($f.Name)" -ForegroundColor Green; $created++ } else { Write-Host "Pulado: $($f.Name) (tem init)" -ForegroundColor Yellow } }; Write-Host "Total criados: $created" -ForegroundColor Cyan
